title: Don’t Believe In Violet - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Enemies Become Lovers   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Slow Romance
author: 주은설
description:
Violet Abton, daughter of the notorious swindler. One day, when she tried to live with her dad, failed and was hiding, she picked up a man who had fallen in the woods.

'... Who am I?'

'You are my servant.'

It was good until she cheated on a man who had lost his memory as a servant, and pampered him, but that man is the Duke of Hessen!

“I'll return it a hundred times for what you did to me. I appoint you as my dedicated maid. '>
